casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, Trustee
v.
Roger W. WOLF et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 20, 2019

Ruthann Wolf, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Melanie Dykasand Tara L. Trifon, in opposition.

The defendant Ruthann Wolf's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn. App. 902, 196 A.3d 411 (2018), is denied.
